meanings.definition: A type of fish found in the Pacific Ocean.
meanings.sent1: The bocaccio swam gracefully in the clear waters.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen were excited to catch a bocaccio for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The bocaccio fish told jokes to the other sea creatures.
meanings.sent4: The bocaccio stood out among the other fish like a colorful gem.
meanings.sent5: Children at the aquarium were amazed by the vibrant colors of the bocaccio.

meanings.definition: The name of an Italian author, Giovanni Boccaccio.
meanings.sent1: In literature class, we learned about the famous author Bocaccio.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy reading the works of Bocaccio for their rich storytelling.
meanings.sent3: Bocaccio's ghost visited the library to check on his books.
meanings.sent4: The words of Bocaccio danced off the pages and into the readers' hearts.
meanings.sent5: The name Bocaccio echoed through the halls of the literary museum.
